a-na {LU₂}SUKKAL be-li₂-ia ARAD-ka {1}DINGIR-ia-da-aʾ lu-u₂ DI-mu a-na {LU₂}SUKKAL be-li₂-ia₂ {1}{d}30-u₂-bal-liṭ {LU₂}ARAD ša {LU₂}SUKKAL be-li₂-ia 02 DUMU-MEŠ-šu₂ {LU₂}GAL-ki-ṣir-MEŠ {LU₂}GAL-ki-ṣir-MEŠ ša {LU₂}SUKKAL be-li₂-ia u₃ šu₂-u {LU₂}NU.BAN₃.DA ša {URU}BAD₃-{1}LUGAL-uk-ku ŠEŠ-šu₂ 01-en ina {URU}arrap-ha it-ta-lak ma-a lu-šag-li-a-šu₂ ih-ti-liq LUGAL it-ta-har x x x x {LU₂}x+x x x x
